items.content_html: TypeNexus is a great tool for API encapsulation and management. It offers a clean and lightweight way to bundle TypeORM + Expressjs functionality, helping you to build applications faster while reducing template code redundancy and type conversion work.

items.content_html: SkeletonGEN: A lightweight Visual Studio Code extension for effortless C++ development. Automatically generates method skeletons in .cpp files from corresponding .h files. Creates the .cpp file if it doesn't exist, eliminating manual copying and pasting. Simplify your workflow with ease!
items.title: PBrossat/SkeletonGEN:  SkeletonGEN: A lightweight Visual Studio Code extension for effortless C++ development. Automatically generates method skeletons in .cpp files from corresponding .h files. Creates the .cpp file if it doesn't exist, eliminating manual copying and pasting. Simplify your workflow with ease!
